cookiePopupText.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on this website. By visiting this site, you automatically accept our use of cookies.

statifyDesc.content: Let's bring you into a new world of statistics.

introDesc.content: Statify basically lets you visualize your in-game statistics inside a Google Spreadsheet. It provides Pie Charts of important stats and some not so important (silly) stats.

introDesc2.content: This mod uploads your statistics into your Google Spreadsheets every 2 minutes.

compatibilityTitle.content: What mods are needed for Statify?

compatibilityDesc.content: Currently the mod is only compatible with Fabric API and its Loader. I didn't plan to make a Forge version, but if there is enough demand for it, then I'll think about it.

requiredVersions.content: The required Fabric versions for the current release of Statify are:

downloadDesc.content: You can download Statify from my <codelink id='statify'>My website</codelink> or from the <codelink id='gitrepo'>GitHub repository</codelink> under releases.

helpDesc2.content: Need any help, Statify's readme contains everything.

helpDesc3.content: Have encountered a bug, or got suggestions or questions, please open an issue ticket on GitHub with the proper labels.
